title: Movie Review Episode 8 - Pork Chop Hill
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: Jeff and Dave discuss the American Korean War Film Pork Chop Hill directed by Lewis Milestone.  The film focuses on the trench warfare in the later Korean War and gives Jeff a good backdrop to discuss that phase of the war.
